messages.content: Welcome! How can I assist you today?
Hello! It's nice to meet you. Is there something I can help you with or would you like to chat?
tell me joke about the news of today

I'm not aware of any specific news from today, but I can try to come up with a joke about the news in general!

Why did the news anchor bring a ladder to work?

Because he wanted to take his reporting to a higher level!
who is the girlfriend of tomothee challamet?

Timothée Chalamet is a private person, and he keeps his personal life out of the spotlight. Therefore, I couldn't find any information about his current girlfriend. However, in the past, he has been linked to several celebrities, including Lily-Rose Depp, Lourdes Leon, and Selena Gomez. But I couldn't find any recent or confirmed information about his current relationship status.
go find on internet the answer
